The Switzerland of South India

Munnar

Wander through rolling tea gardens and shola forests at the highest peak of South India, Anamudi.

Scotland of India

Coorg

Explore misty coffee plantations, cascading waterfalls, and valleys rich in Kodava culture.

Princess of Hill Stations

Kodaikanal

Relax by the star-shaped Kodai Lake, gaze at Pillar Rocks, and wander through pine-clad walks.

Land of Spices and Waterfalls

Wayanad

Trek to Chembra Peak and marvel at heart-shaped lakes, spice hills, and ancient caves.

Queen of Hill Stations

Ooty

Enjoy colonial charm, cool breezes, and panoramic views from Doddabetta and the Botanical Gardens.

The Hidden Jewel

Yercaud

Find tranquility among coffee and orange groves, with vistas of the Shevaroy Hills and emerald lakes.

Coffee Land of South India

Chikmagalur

Breathe in the aroma of coffee estates, conquer Mullayanagiri, and discover serene forest trails.

Offbeat Meadow Retreat

Vagamon

Escape to rolling meadows, pine forests, and mystical viewpoints far from the crowds.

Kodagu's Highest Peak

Tadiandamol

Trek through shola-grassland landscapes to reach Kodagu's tallest summit at sunrise.

Roof of South India

Anamudi

Scale the Western Ghats' tallest peak in Eravikulam National Park and behold panoramic wilderness.

Munnar
Coorg
Kodaikanal
Wayanad
Ooty
Yercaud
Chikmagalur

Photographer
